body:
Comment 11 by **john.arbash.meinel**: 
If you look at my attachment "zlib_test.go", I'm using zlib.NewWriter. And the
compressed contents are not readable by python's zlib, nor by go's zlib. And I'm pretty
sure someone else checked it against a simple C zlib program, and also found that it was
not compatible.

So I'm quite confident that there is a bug in zlib.NewWriter, but whether the bug is
strictly in the flate writer, I don't know.
